title: Duke energy has cut trees, including live oaks, near wires in modest income neighborhoods all over town, but in what appears to be special treatment for high income areas, has not cut trees back in Glen Meade or Forest Hills for years.  Is Duke going to cut trees in these two upper-income neighborhoods like they did in other parts of town? If so, when?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=20097
